text.data: The truth is, I... I have always been lacking a sense of direction ever since long ago... So I don't really know where our destination should be... [character][0x1]... Take care of it for me. Can you give Hornet our destination and the order to depart?[end]I
I'm so acting so old, it's embarrassing... Here, I'll laugh to keep his mind off that...[end]
Oh joy...!! I'm a happy old man...[end]A
Ah... so you will take care of it for me? You really are nice, [character][0x1].[end]H
He hates me... Oh no... I'm an old coot that nobody likes... But... Sendak, don't give up!! At some point [character][0x1] will understand your feelings...!! Oh... I need to respond...[end]I
It goes without saying... If there is anybody who can do it, it is you, [character][0x1].[end]W
Well, I have to take care of the crew's wages and such, so... keep our promise a secret from everybody else...[end]S
